Article Title: Isro launches US comsat BlueBird Block-2; heaviest payload launched by LVM3
Article Text:
Isro BluBird launch

SRIHARIKOTA: India’s heavy-lift rocket LVM3 on Wednesday successfully placed the US communications satellite- BlueBird Block-2 - into low Earth orbit, in an early morning launch mission. At 6100kg, it was the heaviest payload lifted by the rocket which completed its sixth operational flight and third dedicated commercial mission.The 43.5m tall and 640tonne rocket lifted off from the Second Launch Pad at the Satish Dhawan Space Centre, Sriharikota. About 16 minutes after liftoff, BlueBird Block-2 was injected into a circular orbit at an altitude of around 520km with an inclination of 53degrees.The mission, designated LVM3-M6, was undertaken as part of a commercial agreement between NewSpace India Limited (NSIL), the commercial arm of Isro , and US-based AST & Science LLC. BlueBird Block-2 is part of a global low Earth orbit constellation aimed at enabling direct-to-mobile satellite connectivity.According to mission details, the satellite features a 223 square metre phased-array antenna, making it the largest commercial communications satellite deployed in low Earth orbit. The constellation is designed to support 4G and 5G voice and video calls, video streaming, text messaging and data services directly on standard mobile phones, without the need for specialised ground equipment.
Article Summary: Isro blubird launch successfully placed us communications satellite into low earth orbit. At 6100kg, it was the heaviest payload lifted by the rocket which completed its sixth operational flight and third dedicated commercial mission. The 43.5m tall and 640tonne rocket lifted off from the second launch pad at the satish dhawan space centre, sriharikota.

Article Title: Railways’ dedicated high-speed test track to be ready by early 2026
Article Text: NEW DELHI: Indian Railways ’ first dedicated high-speed test track is expected to be complete by March 2026. The 64-km track, on which trains will be tested at a speed of 220 kmph, is being developed in Jodhpur division in Rajasthan with an investment of Rs 967 crore.Railway officials said the stretch is being built in two phases between Gudha and Thathana Mithri, around 70 km from Jaipur. They added that approximately 58 km of the track has been completed.“With the construction of this track, India will be the first country to have comprehensive testing facilities for rolling stock, meeting international standards as per UIC-518/EN-14363 (key railway standards defining methods for testing and approval of rolling stock dynamics). This track will be a unique one globally, as most test tracks currently available elsewhere are shorter than its length,” said an official.The track will provide testing facilities for high-speed rolling stock manufactured worldwide. Comprehensive testing facilities for high-speed rolling stock and components, including speed testing, stability, safety parameters, crash resistance and rolling stock quality, are being developed under this project, as per officials.The dedicated test track will also ensure the testing of track materials, bridges, traction distribution equipment, signalling gear and geotechnical studies.The dedicated test track has seven major bridges, 129 minor bridges and four stations. With its operationalisation, trials can be conducted for a high-speed train passing curved sections without slowing down. Of these curves, some are made for lower speed and some for high speed.
Article Summary: The 64-km track is being developed in jodhpur division in rajasthan. It is being built in two phases between gudha and thathana mithri. Track will provide testing facilities for high-speed rolling stock manufactured worldwide.

Article Title: Sachin Tendulkar invests Rs 3.6 crore in Hyderabad-based solar firm Suntek Energy
Article Text:
Sachin Tendulkar invests in Hyderabad-based solar firm

Hyderabad Headlines Today — The Biggest Updates You Need to Know.

HYDERABAD: Cricketing legend Sachin Tendulkar picked up a stake in Hyderabad-based solar EPC player Suntek Energy Systems Pvt Ltd, which operates as TRUZON Solar. The ‘Little Master' acquired 1.8 lakh shares for Rs 3.6 crore in Suntek, as per the company's filing with the Registrar of Companies (RoC), Hyderabad. This translates into around a 2% stake in the company, TOI has learnt.With this, Suntek joins the growing list of companies in Hyderabad to be backed by the ‘Master Blaster'. Tendulkar made an investment of Rs 5 crore in Azad Engineering, which makes critical components for the aerospace and defence sector, in March 2023 and exited in December 2023 during the company's IPO. He also invested an undisclosed sum in IoT company Smartron in 2016, and it is not clear whether he made an exit.Suntek, which was set up in 2008 by Ch Bhavani Suresh, is a solar engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC) player with a presence across five states – Telangana, Andhra Pradesh, Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, and Chhattisgarh. The Hyderabad-based company has around 400 MW of rooftop and ground-mounted solar installations across industrial, commercial, and residential segments.According to sources, the latest development comes even as the company is gearing up to expand its presence to other states in the south, north, and eastern parts of the country by stepping up its participation in large-scale and institutional solar projects.
Article Summary: Sachin tendulkar invests in hyderabad-based solar firm suntek energy systems pvt ltd. The ‘little master' acquired 1.8 lakh shares for rs 3.6 crore in suntek. This translates into around a 2% stake in the company, toi has learnt.

Article Title: Delhi pollution: GRAP-IV flags polluters, but gaps in emission testing cloud true picture; over 10k vehicles fail test
Article Text:
Delhi’s Air Pollution Gets Attention, But Most Indian Cities Are As Bad Or Worse | I Witness

Delhi Headlines Today — The Biggest Updates You Need to Know.

NEW DELHI: Environment minister Manjinder Singh Sirsa has said that over 10,000 vehicles have failed emission tests since the implementation of GRAP-4 and over 2 lakh have been issued Pollution Under Control (PUC) certificates.He added that govt is also upgrading all PUC centres with high-capacity equipment to reduce delays and ensure accurate emission testing.Additionally, a third-party inspection mechanism will be introduced to strengthen credibility and transparency in certification.He said the 2 lakh vehicles got the PUC tests done after the "No PUC, No Fuel" rule came into effect. Nearly 10,000 vehicles that were tested failed to meet the standards. "This clearly indicates that the enforcement measures are being implemented seriously and are yielding results," Sirsa added.According to experts, the current on-road vehicle inspection programme is weak and based on simple idle testing of CO and hydrocarbons (HC) at two speed idle tests, along with Lambda test for petrol vehicles and smoke density test for diesel vehicles.Researchers at DTU had earlier rolled out an AQI-type PUC certificate system that considered the mileage of vehicles too when testing for emissions.They referred to older studies published with the Atmospheric Pollution Research and American Society of Civil Engineers (ACSE), and suggested inspections and maintenance, along with mileage, as important factors that should be incorporated in PUC tests.Dr Rajeev Kumar Mishra, associate professor at the department of environmental science and engineering at DTU, said the testing now and recertification for in-use cars should include fast idle conditions as well as mass emission testing. The PUC certificate is given just based on the CO and hydrocarbon emissions when the car is in the idle state, meaning the engine is not revving, he said. Emissions such as NO2, PM2.5 and VOC at the fast idling stage at 2500 rpm are sometimes recorded, but these are not considered during certification, he pointed out."Identifying which vehicles should be phased out or issued PUC certificates should be based on the accumulated mileage, maintenance records, and performance according to both emission norms, not just by age," Mishra said. There are no standards from BS-6, and every vehicle is tested based on its built type, he added.According to a study by CSE, vehicle emissions are one of Delhi's major source of air pollution and have a direct impact on human health. While PUC checks may keep the highly polluting vehicles off the road, it still doesn't address the harmful emissions such as PM2.5 and other toxic gases."Various studies on source apportionment and emission inventory have shown that vehicles are the second largest contributor of particulate emissions. Vehicles are responsible for highly toxic exposures as the emissions happen at the breathing height," said Shambhavi Shukla, programme manager on air pollution at the Centre for Science and Environment. She suggested more updated vehicle emission surveillance systems, such as remote sensing mechanisms.She pointed to another layer of problems in PUC certification — the centres themselves. "CSE and EPCA conducted an audit in 2017 of PUC system in Delhi-NCR. They found that at many places, certificates were issued without putting the probe into the tailpipe. In NCR, there were centres that had only printers, not even a monitor. There were instances when different centres showed varying results. PUC staff should have a compulsory ITI certificate but that was not the case," she said.
Article Summary: Environment minister manjinder singh sirsa has said that over 10,000 vehicles have failed emission tests since the implementation of grap-4. He added that govt is also upgrading all puc centres with high-capacity equipment to reduce delays and ensure accurate emission testing.

Article Title: Alec Bohm and Erin Dolan’s Combined Net Worth in 2025: MLB salary, ESPN earnings, endorsements, and more
Article Text:
Alec Bohm and Erin Dolan’s Combined Net Worth in 2025: MLB salary and ESPN earnings endorsements, and more (Image Via Getty)

Alec Bohm’s MLB salary and career money in 2025

Erin Dolan’s ESPN income and net worth in 2025

Inside Alec Bohm and Erin Dolan’s low-key relationship in professional sports

Alec Bohm and Erin Dolan relationship update and career focus in 2025

Alec Bohm and Erin Dolan are now one of sports’ quiet but popular couples. Alec Bohm plays third base for the Philadelphia Phillies. Erin Dolan works as a sports betting analyst on ESPN. Their combined net worth in 2025 is just under $9 million. Dolan's regular media revenue and Bohm's MLB earnings produce this number. Not dramatic headlines, their narrative concerns everyday labor and long-term development.Alec Bohm’s net worth in 2025 is estimated at around $8 million. Most of his money comes from baseball.In January 2025, the Philadelphia Phillies avoided arbitration with him. The team signed Bohm to a one-year deal worth $7.7 million. This contract amount was confirmed through official MLB records.Since making his MLB debut in 2020, Bohm has earned more than $27 million in total salary. He continues to start at third base and plays an important role in the Phillies lineup.Trade rumors have come up in past seasons, but the team has kept him. That shows trust in his performance and consistency.Net worth of Erin Dolan in 2025 is projected to be about $1 million.Her income comes from ESPN employment. She often features on ESPN outlets and programs including Daily Wager.Estimates from the field place her yearly salary in the low five-figure range. She also makes additional money from sponsored posts and brand sponsorships.Dolan signed a multi-year deal with ESPN in 2023. That agreement continues through 2025. Her role has stayed stable, and her visibility has grown across ESPN’s sports betting coverage.Alec Bohm and Erin Dolan made their relationship public in February 2024 during Super Bowl weekend.Since then, they have kept their personal life private. Erin is often seen supporting Bohm at Phillies games. Bohm, in return, supports her media work.There is no marriage or engagement news involving the pair as of mid-2025. Bohm is still concentrating on his Phillies season.Dolan continues her work at ESPN. Their combined net worth of about $9 million reflects two steady careers moving forward together.Also Read: Paul Skenes And Livvy Dunne Combined Net Worth In 2025: MLB Salary, Gymnastics Fame, Endorsements, And Earnings
Article Summary: Alec bohm plays third base for the philadelphia phillies. Erin dolan works as a sports betting analyst on espn. Their combined net worth in 2025 is just under $9 million. No marriage or engagement news involving the pair as of mid-2025.

Article Title: Shane McMahon and Marissa Mazzola-McMahon combined net worth in 2025: WWE legacy, business ventures, and financial empire
Article Text:
Shane McMahon and Marissa Mazzola-McMahon (Image Source: Getty)

Shane McMahon’s WWE legacy and wealth creation

Business ventures and Marissa Mazzola-McMahon’s role

Shane McMahon and Marissa Mazzola-McMahon, who both served as WWE Producer/Director, are worth a combined $650 million, the result of decades spent near one of sports entertainment’s most influential families and a carefully curated soon-to-branch portfolio beyond the ring. Shane, as a key McMahon heir, has had his financial profile associated with WWE's ascendance to a worldwide media conglomerate for decades, while Marissa's career has been largely away from the limelight.Their fortune, collectively, is uneven but complementary at best. The vast bulk of the couple's wealth originates from Shane, who owns most of the couple's cash, investments, and property, as Marissa’s professional income and personal assets serve to augment, not scale, the family nest-egg. Rumors in the financial, as well as the gossip and entertainment worlds, have put their collective net gross at around $205 million by the year 2025, but the numbers are tightly held secret from the outside world.Even hooks have different weights, and for Shane McMahon, his financial foundation came from WWE, where he served in various capacities as an executive, on-camera talent, and brand representative. He was in charge when WWE became a publicly traded, globally syndicating corporation, a transition that paid senior insiders in the form of salaries, bonuses and equity-linked pay.Shane also became recognized over the years for the insane, risk-taking, high impact, physical matches that elevated his brand and worth.Overall, Shane's net worth is often assumed to be around $200 million in 2025 as an individual. That number includes years of WWE and associated earnings, assets from the McMahon family estate, and WWE-affiliated corporate relationships. Although he was never as high on the control totem pole as his old man, Vince, his standing in the company meant he was around some significant cash decisions in WWE's most successful years.Shane McMahon has built up a portfolio of separate business interests away from the world of WWE, with a particular focus on technology, media, and emerging industries. He has been chairman and advisor to a number of companies, as part of the indication that he might be looking to diversify beyond wrestling-related income. They have not always been runaway headline-grabbers, but all together they build up his overall financial footprint and his long game for the long haul.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Less dramatic is the financial story of Marissa Mazzola-McMahon. She comes from a film production and corporate public relations background, and her career has been built on cash flows, not large equity windfalls. Her own net worth is frequently thought to be about $5 million. Add in Shane's holdings, and their financial empire still has deep roots in WWE legacy wealth, supported, but increasingly crucial, by business diversification.Also Read: Shane McMahon adds fuel to rumors of Vince McMahon reclaiming WWE ownership
Article Summary: Shane mcmahon and marissa mazzola-mcmahon, who both served as wwe producer/director, are worth a combined $650 million. Shane, as a key mcmahon heir, has had his financial profile associated with wwe's ascendance to a worldwide media conglomerate for decades. Marissa's career has been largely away from the limelight.

Article Title: Torrie Wilson and Justin Tupper combined net worth in 2025: WWE history, investments, and lifestyle
Article Text:
Torrie Wilson and Justin Tupper (Image Source: Getty)

Torrie Wilson’s WWE legacy and long-term earnings

Justin Tupper’s business career and investment footprint

Torrie Wilson and Justin Tupper are often described as a low-key power couple of WWE, balancing a legacy sports-entertainment career with modern digital media leadership. While Wilson is a well-known name around the world in wrestling circles, Tupper has flown a bit under the radar in the business of sports and content platforms.Uniting as a couple, their 2025 net worth speaks to both prudent career choices, diversified income sources, and a life of relatively low pomp and circumstance. Instead of bombastic and excessive numbers and stories, their financial narrative thrives through longevity, strategy, and continual relevancy.Another notable entry on the list is Torrie Wilson, who racked up her wealth in the early 2000s, which is viewed as the peak of WWE's commercial success. Without a doubt, one of the most recognisable Divas in company history, the television contracts, pay-per-view bonuses, merchandise royalties, modelling opportunities, and other ventures outside of wrestling all accumulated over the years. She also snatched up mainstream magazine covers, including shots in fitness and lifestyle magazines, which only increased her earning power.Wilson continued his earnings through WWE Legends deals as well as convention and Hall of Fame appearances, even after walking away from full-time wrestling.However, in recent years, she has earned an income with social media partnerships and fitness brand collaborations. Her personal net worth by 2025 is estimated to be anywhere around $2 million, a number not so much created by in-ring work at that point but rather from the appropriate use of a well-maintained brand.Yet Justin Tupper’s earning power from a different professional world also adds immensely to the couple’s overall wealth. Tupper took advantage of early trends in direct-to-consumer sports media as the founder of Revolution Golf, a digital golf instruction and commerce platform. His company's being purchased and absorbed into a greater media universe was a seminal financial moment of his professional life.After the success, Tupper had moved into senior management positions in tech firms that serviced sports and entertainment firms, earning a salary and long-term incentives on an ongoing basis. His net worth is probably not public knowledge, but as a benchmark for startup executives at his level with founder exits, the assets are in the low-to-mid seven-figure range. His financial profile consists of business equity rather than salary to be reinvested, rather than being a random celebrity income.Also Read: Trish Stratus and Ron Fisico combined net worth in 2025: WWE legacy, fitness ventures, and family wealth
Article Summary: Torrie wilson and justin tupper are a low-key power couple of wwe. They balance a legacy sports-entertainment career with modern digital media leadership. Wilson racked up her wealth in the early 2000s, which is viewed as the peak of wwe's commercial success.

Article Title: Elon Musk's net worth: The world's richest man becomes the first ever with $600 billion worth amid SpaceX's valuation surge
Article Text:
Source: Forbes

'US Benefited Immensely From Indians', Says Tesla CEO Elon Musk, Warns US Against Scrapping H-1B

Elon Musk becomes the first person to hit a whopping figure of $600 billion in net worth





Elon Musk’s wealth surge driven by SpaceX, Tesla, and xAI





SpaceX





Tesla

xAI

Elon Musk’s rapid rise: From $24 billion to the brink of trillionaire status









Elon Musk has reached a historical financial milestone, as he has become the first-ever person to ever achieve a net worth that surpasses the whopping figure of $600 billion, as reported in Forbes magazine. This milestone has been achieved during a time when there is newfound interest in his privately owned rocket company, SpaceX, which he believes will make a historical initial start detailing a whopping value of $800 billion with an initial public offering that could potentially take place in 2026.Musk's net worth has not only increased with his involvement with his rocket company, SpaceX, but he has earned a tremendous amount of money with his investment in electric cars with his company, Tesla, where his net worth has increased by a whopping 12% because of his investment in his own artificial intelligence company, xAI.As reported by Forbes, Elon Musk has now broken yet another record by being the first individual to ever reach a net worth of over $600 billion. This achievement has come at a time when his private rocket company, SpaceX, has seen a tremendous rise in market value, with plans of an initial public offering in 2026. Musk's net worth is also contributed by his stake of 12% in Tesla, an electric vehicle behemoth, and his artificial intelligence company, xAI, both of which keep increasing in value.From groundbreaking innovations in space travel and electric mobility to ambitious AI projects, futuristic ventures, and global business expansions, Musk’s diversified portfolio and relentless pursuit of technological advancement have cemented his status as the world’s richest person.SpaceX has also showcased its role in the increasing wealth of Musk to historic levels. With an estimated 42% stake in the firm, the net worth of Musk is expected to grow by an enormous $168 billion if SpaceX continues to retain its current valuation of $800 billion. Analysts also expect it to reach a valuation of $1.5 trillion when it comes to the public market and possibly become the first trillionaire in the world. The innovative nature of SpaceX in terms of its rocket and satellite launches continues to impress the market while affecting the net worth of its CEO.Tesla stock is still an integral part of Musk’s financial network. His current stake of about 12% in Tesla is valued at $197 billion without taking into consideration the stock options from the 2018 CEO Performance Award that are still winding their way through litigation. Apart from that, Tesla shareholders have just approved what is considered the largest compensation deal of $1 trillion that is pegged on meeting various performance goals, including doubling the current market capitalization eightfold in ten years.Musk’s AI company, xAI, is also a significant contributor to his net worth. In the advanced talk of raising funding worth $15 billion in fresh equity, the firm is placed at a value of $230 billion. Musk owns about 53% of the firm’s stakes under xAI Holdings, meaning he has a net worth of about $60 billion. AI is another major sector into which Musk has ventured.Musk's emergence to $600 billion in a short span of time can be noted. He started with $24.6 billion in March 2020 and broke the $100 billion mark later in the same year, and reached $190 billion in January 2021. He broke many records in the last five years with his wealth and became the first person to break $500 billion in October 2025. At present, he leads the richest people in the world by a very large margin of $425 billion over Google co-founder Larry Page and is soon to reach $700 billion.
Article Summary: Elon musk has become the first-ever person to ever achieve a net worth that surpasses the whopping figure of $600 billion. His private rocket company, spacex, has seen a tremendous rise in market value, with plans of an initial public offering in 2026.

Article Title: Kevin Durant NBA contract details: Total earnings, salary cap, and more
Article Text:
Kevin Durant (Photo by Garrett Ellwood/NBAE via Getty Images)

Kevin Durant’s contract breakdown



Off-court ventures of Kevin Durant



Kevin Durant’s trade from Suns to the Houston Rockets in exchange for Jalen Green, Dillon Brooks, and involving seven teams and several draft picks, officially made the 2014 MVP the highest-paid man in NBA history with projected career earnings of approximately $600 million that surpass that of LeBron James.At just 37, Kevin Durant is commanding more money and is raising the financial standard of the league while some of his contemporaries struggle to even hold on with the changing rhythm of the league. Durant’s trade to the Rockets in July 2025 was nothing short of a blockbuster deal. With the Rockets, Durant has clocked in 36.7 minutes on court per game while averaging 25.3 points, 5.0 rebounds, and 4.1 assists, shooting 50.9% from the field and 43.5% from the three-pointer line.Kevin Durant, post his trade, signed a 2-year extension with the Rockets in October 2025 worth $90 million. This deal promises him a cap hit of $43 million in 2026 and $46 million in 2027 with a player option, illustrating a masterclass in modern sports business. For the current 2025-26 season, Durant is set to earn $54.7 million under his previous agreement.Kevin Durant might have accepted an extension below his maximum eligible amount, but this provides the Rockets with the cap flexibility to fill the bench with exceptional talents and increase the chances for him to win his third NBA championship.But even with this salary dip, Durant’s contract remains a significant moment for other veteran players, considering he’s in his 19th NBA season.As per Spotrac, with this extension, Kevin Durant nudges past LeBron James with projected earnings of $591 million to conquer the top place on the list of players with the highest NBA career earnings.The NBA paycheck is hefty, but for Kevin Durant, it is just one half of the coin. In 2019, he reported earning $35 million from his off-court ventures, showcasing his business prowess. Alongside his longtime business partner, Rich Kleiman, Durant has transformed his brand into a massive empire. Through 35V, he currently manages a portfolio of over 100 startups, ranging from artificial intelligence to fintech giants like Robinhood.With his media and content company, Boardroom, Kevin Durant focuses on sports and culture and has evolved it into a powerhouse. He has also invested in Andbox, an Esports company, and combined with a lifetime deal with Nike that pays him an estimated $50 million annually.Kevin Durant’s business success also fuels his Philanthropy. Through "Build It and They Will Ball," a signature mission of the Kevin Durant Charity Foundation, they build or fully renovate basketball courts in underserved communities by using sports as a tool. Durant's legacy is not through the big bucks or the baskets, but also through his charitable footprints that he is leaving behind.Also Read: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander NBA contract details: Total earnings, salary cap and
Article Summary: Kevin durant signed a 2-year extension with the rockets in october 2025 worth $90 million. With this extension, kevin durant nudges past lebron james with projected earnings of $591 million. In 2019, he reported earning $35 million from his off-court ventures, showcasing his business prowess.

The flip side is: The ‘super apps,’ which are very popular in China, are not popular in the same way outside of China, and I think they’re turning into a Chinese super app. And that may or may not work outside of China. Are they overly projecting one win on the next, or am I just a naive out-of-touch Westerner who’s underestimating where the future’s gonna be? That’ll be interesting to see how that plays out.”

Article Title: Realme 16 Pro series launch on January 6: Price, 200MP camera, colour variants and more to expect
Article Text:
Realme 16 Pro series design

Realme 16 Pro series camera





Realme is set to launch its next number series smartphone range in January 2026. The company has announced that it will unveil Realme 16 Pro series in India on January 6. Ahead of the scheduled debut, Realme has teased some features of the upcoming smartphone, including its camera, design, colour variants among others. As teased by the company, Realme 16 Pro series will feature a Urban Wild Design. The handsets will be equipped with 200MP camera and will be offered in four colour options. Here’s everything you need to know about the upcoming Realme phoneRealme says that it has partnered with renowned designer Naoto Fukasawa for the Realme 16 Pro Series. It introduces the all-new Urban Wild Design, “a philosophy that blends natural textures with modern urban aesthetics” and “crafted to help users find their own “field of freedom” amid fast-paced city life”.As teased by the company, the series features industry-first bio-based organic silicone material. It will come in four colour variants including Master Gold, Master Grey, Camellia Pink, and Orchid Purple.Realme is positioning the upcoming smartphone series as “200MP Portrait Master”. Camera on the series will be powered by 200MP LumaColor Camera, offering detailed group shots, expressive solo portraits, and immersive stage and lifestyle photography across multiple focal length.At the core of the imaging experience is LumaColor IMAGE, realme’s self-developed portrait imaging technology which will make its global debut on the Realme 16 Pro Series."The realme 16 Pro Series continues the legacy of the Number Series by combining premium design sensibilities with next-generation imaging experiences, making advanced smartphone photography and refined aesthetics accessible to young users," the company said.
Article Summary: Realme is set to launch its next number series smartphone range in january 2026. The company has announced that it will unveil realme 16 pro series in india on january 6. The handsets will be equipped with 200mp camera and will be offered in four colour options.

Article Title: Before becoming Microsoft CEO, Satya Nadella faced the 'One rejection' Indian students fear most
Article Text:
Microsoft CEO 'Thrilled' About India's Growing Data Centre Capacity, Details Meet With PM Modi

Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella’s joinery from Manipal





Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella once shared his experience of how not going to IIT which he describes as the "the holy grail" for middle-class students became a turning point for him. The IIT rejection redirected his life towards a path only few could have imagined and which eventually led him to become the CEO of Microsoft, one of the world’s most valuable companies. Speaking to LinkedIn CEO Ryan Roslansky in 2023, Nadella revealed that as a teenage in Hyderabad his ambition revolved around cricket and banking. He said that he never thought of software. Nadella further added that like many of friends he also viewed IIT as the pinnacle of academic achievement. But when he failed to secure admission, Nadella faced a setback that could have easily defined his future. Instead, it became the catalyst for a different journey.Nadella described IIT as “the holy grail” for middle-class students, acknowledging the weight of expectations. Yet, he later reflected that not getting in forced him to explore other opportunities ones that ultimately shaped his resilience and adaptability.After getting rejected from IIT, Nadella got enrolled at the Manipal Institute of Technology, where he studied electrical engineering. The decision of taking admission in Manipal Institute of Technology set him on a trajectory that would take him to the University of Wisconsin–Milwaukee for a master’s degree.After completing his masters he enrolled in the University of Chicago for an MBA.Nadella also recalled that after reaching the US he faced cultural shocks, homesickness and the challenge of proving himself in a new country. He said that he often joked about the fact that he simply cannot locate Milwaukee on a map before moving there. However, all these experiences helped him in building adaptability which later went ahead and defined his leadership style.Nadella joined Microsoft in 1992, after working at Sun Microsystems. Over, the next two decade he rose steadily through the ranks and the became the Microsoft CEO in 2014. When Nadella became the CEO, the company was facing a lot competition from Apple, Google and Amazon. However, under his leadership, Microsoft reinvented itself and it now a market valuation of $3.54 trillion.Nadella has often said that “only in America would someone like me get the chance to prove himself rather than be typecast based on the school I attended.”
Article Summary: Microsoft ceo satya nadella once shared his experience of how not going to iit which he describes as the "the holy grail" for middle-class students became a turning point for him. The iit rejection redirected his life towards a path only few could have imagined and which eventually led him to become the ceo of microsoft.

The New York Times’ Connections has quickly risen to a favourites list for word game enthusiasts, fusing the addictive elegance of word games such as Wordle with more complex puzzles in the realms of logic and pattern recognition. Daily, players are offered a collection of 16 apparently random words, placed in a 4x4 matrix, which must be grouped into four different thematically consistent sets, requiring a solution that relies on the discovery of often subtle connections, ties, and wordplay. Puzzle enthusiasts seeking a challenging and informative solution will find the December 22, 2025 issue, game number 925, to offer a perfect balance of knowledge and intellect. Connections remains a continuing source of fascination for an international following, a daily challenge for intellectual acuity and mental dexterity.NYT Connections is a very engaging word association game aimed at evaluating the ability to use analytical thinking and logic when problem-solving. In contrast to a normal word game, playing this game requires the ability to distinguish very subtle connections between the words associated with the game, ranging from very straightforward connections to very abstract ones.The game can be played for free through desktop or mobile operating systems on any device at the convenience of the players. Due to the easy-to-grasp game mechanics and the very challenging puzzles required in the game, many people actually make the game a daily routine for themselves.To help players without revealing the solution, here are some strategies for December 22, 2025:These hints guide players toward recognising patterns, encouraging logical deduction and strategic grouping without removing the challenge entirely.Here are the connection categories available today in the NYT Connections puzzle:Below are the four correct groups for today’s puzzle:The word choices are arranged in a 4x4 matrix. Find connections between the words to categorize them into four appropriate groups.Yes, the game offers subtle clues so as not to pamper the players.It is also free to download for mobile and computer usage.It improves pattern recognition, logical thinking, lateral thinking, and problem-solving abilities.

Article Title: American billionaire Mark Cuban to young engineers: Pick small or medium companies over MNCs as bringing new graduates on AI projects is …
Article Text:
Mark Cuban advice young engineers to not go behind big companies

The state of AI adoption





American billionaire and entrepreneur Mark Cuban has now urged the young engineers entering the job market to prioritise small and medium-sized companies over multinational corporations (MNCs) when seeking opportunities in artificial intelligence (AI). Cuban feels that smaller companies offer better platform for new graduates to make an immediate impact, while large corporations often dilute individual contributions.Speaking in an interview with CNBC and on his podcast The Dumbest Guy in the Room, Cuban explained that smaller companies are mainly entrepreneur-driven and they lack the deep IT departments or larger corporations. This gap creates opportunities for fresh graduates which directly contribute to the AI projects.“Small- to medium-size companies don’t have that depth. They are typically entrepreneurially driven and don’t have the flexibility to have people research things. Bringing a new graduate on to work on agentic AI projects is inexpensive for them and can get them immediate results,” Cuban said.Cuban also used the example of his own company, Cost Plus Drugs, noting how AI can automate processes to boost productivity, competitiveness, and profitability.Cuban argued that in big organisations, AI skills may not stand out as they are common among thousands of IT employees. On the other hand, in smaller firms often lack such expertise, making new graduates with AI knowledge invaluable. He also compared the present wave of AI with early days of the internet, when young engineers were hired to implement new technologies because they were more comfortable with them than older executives.Cuban also highlighted that 95% of companies have not yet seen measurable revenue returns from AI investments. The exceptions, he said, are mostly early-stage startups led by young entrepreneurs who design their processes around AI models tailored to their businesses.He urged his children and other young people to learn as much as possible about AI, stressing that companies are still grappling with how to use the technology for competitive advantage.
Article Summary: Mark cuban has urged young engineers to prioritise small and medium-sized companies over multinational corporations (mncs) when seeking opportunities in artificial intelligence. Cuban feels that smaller companies offer better platform for new graduates to make an immediate impact.

Article Title: Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu responds to user asking about Arattai app: ‘We will market it …’
Article Text:
Arattai app: Features and challenges

One-to-one and group chats with text, voice notes, and media sharing

Audio and video calls with end-to-end encryption

Multi-device support, including desktop and Android TV apps

Stories and channels for broadcasting updates



Arattai app gets end-to-end encryption







Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu was recently asked by an X (formerly Twitter) user why there is no talk about Arattai now? The user quoted a post stating that Telegram is worth $30 billion with only 30 employees working from home, no office. Responding to the user’s question, Vembu shared that the company is doing “updates weekly” and is working on “some very important features”. “We will market it more once we feel we are satisfied with the feature set!,” Vembu posted, adding “This is a marathon. We are geared for it.”To recall, the Arattai app debuted in 2021 as a rival to Meta’s WhatsApp. Years after its launch, the app recently gained momentum after senior government ministers like Piyush Goyal joined the platform. In September this year, Arattai (meaning chat in Tamil) topped App Store ranking, registering 3,50,000 signs in just three days.Arattai offers familiar features such as:However, the app is still ironing out issues. Users have reported OTP delays, slower contact sync, and call glitches due to server overload.Last month, the company rolled out system-wide end-to-end encryption on the Arattai app. Announcing the release in an X post, Vembu then said that it is a “forced upgrade on all because it is a drastic change”.“We had to do some redesign around it and we wanted extensive testing because it is a drastic change. It is now being tested by about 6,000 people in the company. We identified some issues and have fixed them. We are doing one more round of testing on a new build that has fixed the issues identified,” he then said.
Article Summary: Zoho founder sridhar vembu was recently asked by an x (formerly twitter) user why there is no talk about arattai now. The user quoted a post stating that telegram is worth $30 billion with only 30 employees working from home, no office. “we will market it more once we feel we are satisfied with the feature set!,” vem bu posted, adding “this is a marathon.

Article Title: Vince Zampella, Battlefield chief and Call of Duty co-creator, killed in car accident at 55
Article Text:
Gaming icon Vince Zampella, the visionary behind Call of Duty and leader of Battlefield, tragically passed away at 55 in a car accident. Zampella's career defined modern shooters, co-founding Infinity Ward and later Respawn Entertainment, delivering hits like Apex Legends. His influence on interactive entertainment and inspiration to millions is widely mourned.

Legacy built on Battlefield revival and first-person shooter innovation

‘Call of Duty’ Creator Vince Zampella Dies In Horrific Highway Crash Caught On Camera

Gaming community mourns visionary Developer who shaped modern shooters





Vince Zampella, the gaming industry titan behind the blockbuster Call of Duty franchise and leader of the Battlefield series, died Sunday in a single-vehicle crash on Angeles Crest Highway near Los Angeles. He was 55. The Ferrari he was driving veered off the winding mountain road around 12:45 p.m., struck a concrete barrier, and caught fire, according to California Highway Patrol reports. A passenger in the vehicle was ejected and later died at a hospital. Authorities have not confirmed whether alcohol or drugs were factors in the crash.Zampella's career defined modern military shooters. He co-founded Infinity Ward in 2002, where he spearheaded the original Call of Duty in 2003—a World War II game that evolved into one of gaming's most successful franchises. The series has sold over 500 million copies globally and generated more than $30 billion in revenue.After his contentious 2010 departure from Activision and subsequent legal settlement, Zampella established Respawn Entertainment. The studio delivered critically acclaimed titles including Titanfall, Apex Legends, and the Star Wars Jedi series. Electronic Arts acquired Respawn in 2013, and in 2021, tasked Zampella with revitalizing the struggling Battlefield franchise—culminating in this year's well-received Battlefield 6."This is an unimaginable loss," Electronic Arts stated Monday. "Vince's influence on the video game industry was profound and far-reaching. His work helped shape modern interactive entertainment and inspired millions of players and developers around the world."Game Awards founder Geoff Keighley called Zampella "an extraordinary person—a gamer at heart, but also a visionary executive with a rare ability to recognize talent." He added that while Zampella created some of gaming's most influential titles, "I always felt he still had his greatest one ahead of him."A Paramount Pictures live-action Call of Duty film remains in production, ensuring Zampella's creative vision will continue reaching new audiences.
Article Summary: Vince zampella, the visionary behind call of duty and leader of battlefield, died sunday in a car accident. The ferrari he was driving veered off the winding mountain road around 12:45 p.m. struck a concrete barrier, and caught fire. A passenger in the vehicle was ejected and later died at a hospital.

Article Title: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg's 'highest-paid' employee is reportedly unhappy with his Boss, feels he ...
Article Text:
Mark Zuckerberg (File Image)

Alexandr Wang is reportedly clashing with Meta’s old guard

Meta’s Secret AI Army: Top Talent Hired from OpenAI, Google & More

Alexandr Wang memo on Meta's massive AI restructure





In June this year, Facebook-parent Meta Platforms agreed to take a 49% stake in artificial intelligence (AI) startup Scale AI for $14.8 billion. As part of the deal, Scale AI CEO Alexandr Wang took top position inside Meta, leading the company's new “superintelligence” lab, , Meta Superintelligence Labs, or MSL. The 28-year-old founder of Scale AI, Wang has been installed as the public face of Zuckerberg’s AI reboot. Mark Zuckerberg reportedly paid billions to bring billionaire AI prodigy Alexandr Wang on board. However, it reportedly seems that all is not well between the AI wunderkind and his Boss, Mark Zuckerberg. The 41-year-old Zuckerberg is said to have backed his new hires with nine-figure compensation packages to lure top researchers from rivals, igniting a Silicon Valley poaching war.According to a report in Financial Times, Wang privately believes that CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s micromanagement of the company’s AI push is "suffocating". Wang is said to have complained to associates that Zuckerberg’s tight grip on the effort is stifling progress, the report said, citing multiple people familiar with the situation. Report adds that cracks have begun to emerge at an executive level and that tensions have been bubbling between Wang and Zuckerberg for sometime now.As per the report, internally, some staff question whether Wang is out of his depth, given his lack of experience managing teams in a large corporation but also his expertise in AI data services rather than as an AI researcher pushing technical breakthroughs.Incidentally, Alexander Wang’s arrival at Meta has created friction over the company's fundamental approach to AI development, with his superintelligence team pushing to make the company’s next model “closed” — keeping its technology secret. This is said to mark a major departure from Meta’s longtime philosophy of open-sourcing its models for other developers to build upon, causing some old guard members to chafe at the change, the Times reported.The new leadership has chosen to abandon Meta’s previous frontier model called Behemoth, which saw its release delayed last spring after disappointing performance tests. Meta’s AI division faces a dramatic four-way split as Meta reorganizes into groups focused on research, superintelligence development, products, and infrastructure, according to the report.As the new vision and leadership have crystallised, some top names have left. Among them, in recent weeks, Meta’s longtime chief legal officer Jennifer Newstead was poached by arch-rival Apple, while chief revenue officer John Hegeman announced he too was leaving to launch a start-up.Similarly, chief AI scientist and Turing Award winner Yann LeCun is departing Meta to launch a new AI initiative. He had reportedly taken exception at having to report to Wang. Another reason cited for his resignation is that his longer-term research was reportedly hit hard by the recent cuts announced at Meta.Meta reorganized its AI teams in June this year. The memo said that most team leaders will report directly to 28-year-old Wang. This included investor and former GitHub CEO Nat Friedman, who heads MSL's product team and was announced as an MSL leader alongside Wang in June. In the email sent to employees, Wang wrote that "superintelligence is coming," and to "take it seriously," Meta needs to make major changes. This includes establishing four distinct teams that focus on research, training, products, and infrastructure.
Article Summary: Alexandr wang is reportedly clashing with meta’s old guard. Mark zuckerberg reportedly paid billions to bring billionaire ai prodigy alexandr wang on board. Wang is said to have complained to associates that zuckerberg's tight grip on the effort is stifling progress.
